goals__remit: Oulu is a city and municipality of 200 000 inhabitants (2016) in the region of Northern Ostrobothnia, in Finland. It is the most populous city in Northern Finland and the fifth most populous city in the country. It is one of the northernmost larger cities in the world. As stated By Nordregio 2016, City of Oulu is the fastest growing urban region in Scandinavia. Over the past 20 years the population has grown 37 %.
